import React from 'react' export default class Navbar extends React.Component { componentDidMount() { const infoBar = document.querySelector('.info-bar'); window.addEventListener('scroll', () => { if(window.pageYOffset > 0) { infoBar.style.height = '75px' infoBar.style.opacity = '.97' } if (window.pageYOffset === 0) { infoBar.style.height = '50px'; infoBar.style.opacity = '1' } }) } render(){ return (
